name: Nue Windows
description:
Originally released in 2013.

Nue Windows is part of the Touhou 2600 minigames series of Touhou fangames, and is the Windows counterpart of the earlier Nue 2600.

Play as PC-98 Reimu, a shrine maiden, avoid bullets, and have a faceoff with the alienic Nue in this Breakout-styled game based on Touhou 1: Highly Responsive to Prayers. Your main attack is whacking the yin-yang orb, and your sub attack is shooting ofuda. While whacking, you are invincible, but you also can not move.

Move, whack, and shoot with your mouse. Press Space to bomb.

Game collaborated with TheUltimate.

Works on Windows XP/Vista/7/10 (may crash on Windows 8)
